source.322140f7:
sns.catplot(x='PowerTrain',y='Range_Km',data=car_data)
plt.title('PowerTrain Vs Range')
sns.catplot(x='PowerTrain',y='Efficiency_WhKm',data=car_data)
plt.title('Power Train Vs Efficiency')

sns.catplot(x='PowerTrain',y='TopSpeed_KmH',data=car_data)
plt.title('PowerTrain Vs Top Speed')

source.42b66392:
# EVs - One Electric Vehicle Dataset
## Compare and analyze today's electric cars!

## Our task is to find out the following details
    1) Which car has the fastest 0-100 acceleration?
    2) Which has the highest efficiency?
    3) Does a difference in power train effect the range, top speed, efficiency?
    4) Which manufacturer has the most number of vehicles?
    5) How does price relate to rapid charging?
source.5f21dbf6: Tesla produces largest number of cars
source.a810729d: ### Which manufacturer has the most number of vehicles?
